name: jfPaint
short_description:
Java based Paint program.
Features : multi-tabbed, pencil, line, curve, fill, box, circle, text, substitute, transparency, gradients and gaussian blur.
Now supports multiple layers (proprietary file format).
Supports : JPG, PNG, BMP.
summary: Java based Paint program.  Built with JavaForce SDK.
